welcomeMessage: Learn capitals and flags of the world.
aboutTitle: üåé Learn the Capitals and Flags of the World
aboutText: Capitalympics is a web application that helps you learn the flags and capitals of countries around the world. It provides a filtered learning experience by allowing you to focus on specific regions of the world. You can track your progress with individual scores for each country as well as an overall score. The application also allows you to view your statistics on your profile and sort and filter them by category
aboutSection1Title: üìà Improve Your Skills with Personalized Learning (soon)
aboutSection1Text: At Capitalympics, we understand that everyone learns at their own pace. That's why our app uses advanced algorithms to track your progress and provide personalized recommendations based on your individual needs. With Capitalympics, you can improve your skills and master the capitals and flags of the world.
aboutSection2Title: üîç Filter and Sort Countries to Learn More
aboutSection2Text: Our app features powerful search and filtering capabilities that allow users to find the information they need quickly and easily. Whether you're looking for a specific country or want to explore a particular region of the world, Capitalympics makes it simple.
aboutSection3Text: Learning doesn't have to be boring! That's why we've created a fun and engaging quiz game that lets you test your knowledge of the world's capitals and flags. With multiple difficulty levels you can track your progress, the Capitalympics Quiz Game is the perfect way to add some excitement to your learning experience.
aboutSection4Text: Our app is designed to help you achieve your learning goals and become a Capitalympics champion. With each correct answer, you'll earn points and increase your overall score.
aboutSection5Text: Capitalympics was created by a passionate student developer who loves learning about different countries and cultures. As someone who has always been fascinated by flags and capitals, he wanted to create an app that would make it easy for others to learn as well.
aboutSection6Text: If you're interested in checking out the code behind Capitalympics or contributing to the project, you can find the repo on GitHub. The app is built using a variety of cutting-edge technologies, and the developer is always looking for ways to improve it and make it even more fun and engaging for users.
aboutFooter: We hope you enjoy using Capitalympics as much as we enjoyed creating it. Happy learning ! üåçüöÄ
